body_html:
Thank you @zakizhou That worked.
@aselle Sorry for the post but I did ask on Stack overflow and couldn't get a response. I tried the reshape thing too but the sess.run calls didn't work. Turns out it was usage error like you pointed out. I was confused as to how to input the height value of tensor into another tensor (reshape).

`height = tf.cast(features['height'], tf.int32)
width = tf.cast(features['width'], tf.int32)
depth = tf.cast(features['depth'], tf.int32)
label_str = tf.cast(features['label_str'], tf.string)
len_label = tf.cast(features['len_label'], tf.int32)

image_shape = tf.stack([height, width, depth])
image = tf.decode_raw(features['image_raw'], tf.uint8)
image = tf.reshape(image, image_shape)`

This worked. Thanks for the help.
body_text:
Thank you @zakizhou  That worked.
@aselle Sorry for the post but I did ask on Stack overflow and couldn't get a response. I tried the reshape thing too but the sess.run calls didn't work. Turns out it was usage error like you pointed out. I was confused as to how to input the height value of tensor into another tensor (reshape).
`height = tf.cast(features['height'], tf.int32)
width = tf.cast(features['width'], tf.int32)
depth = tf.cast(features['depth'], tf.int32)
label_str = tf.cast(features['label_str'], tf.string)
len_label = tf.cast(features['len_label'], tf.int32)
image_shape = tf.stack([height, width, depth])
image = tf.decode_raw(features['image_raw'], tf.uint8)
image = tf.reshape(image, image_shape)`
This worked. Thanks for the help.
body:
Thank you @zakizhou  That worked.
@aselle Sorry for the post but I did ask on Stack overflow and couldn't get a response. I tried the reshape thing too but the sess.run calls didn't work. Turns out it was usage error like you pointed out. I was confused as to how to input the height value of tensor into another tensor (reshape). 

`height = tf.cast(features['height'], tf.int32)
  width = tf.cast(features['width'], tf.int32)
  depth = tf.cast(features['depth'], tf.int32)
  label_str = tf.cast(features['label_str'], tf.string)
  len_label = tf.cast(features['len_label'], tf.int32)

  image_shape = tf.stack([height, width, depth])
  image = tf.decode_raw(features['image_raw'], tf.uint8)
  image = tf.reshape(image, image_shape)`

This worked. Thanks for the help.
